events.message: I want to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week because it does not fit as expected and I no longer want it.
The reported issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for returning the product and receiving their money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order submitted by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket. I'll be happy to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for the refund to proceed?
Sure, my order number is #123456789. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging, just as I received it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. Please pack the jacket securely and use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket, and the refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this refund case. Please contact us again if you require any further assistance.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
